data.title: Gemma Atkinson: Everything you need to know about the Hits Radio presenter
data.meta_description: Presenter Gemma Atkinson hosts the drivetime show with Mike Toolan on Hits Radio, is the author of two books, and has been on Hollyoaks, Emmerdale and I'm A Celebrity.
data.text:
She's back on our airwaves!

We absolutely LOVE listening to Gemma Atkinson every weekday 4pm - 7pm with Mike Toolan on Hits Radio, and now she's returned from taking time off to look after baby Thiago after welcoming him in July 2023! As well as being a hugely talented radio presenter, actress and writer, Gemma has accomplished so much more throughout her career so far.

After a spell away, Gemma and Mike reunited on the radio - and it's safe to say the pair were very excited to be back in the studio together! Their show is full of fun, the biggest hits AND biggest throwbacks. Find out more about Gemma right here...

How old is Gemma Atkinson?

Gemma Atkinson was born on 16th November 1984, making her 39-years-old.

For her 39th birthday in 2023, Gem's partner Gorka shared a gushing post about her. He wrote on Instagram: '39 years in this planet and the las 6 i was lucky to be by your side, full of laughs and the best memories‚Ä¶

'Thanks for being the best mummy and fiancee and thank you for everything you do for us! and for always make us laugh out loudüòÇ We love you mummy ‚ù§Ô∏è'. (sic)

How tall is she?

Gemma is 1.75 metres or 5ft 9in tall.

Where is she from?

Gemma was born in Bury, Greater Manchester.

How to listen to Gemma Atkinson on the radio

You can find Gemma every weekday from 4pm along with Mike Toolan here on Hits Radio. While she was off to have baby Thiago, we had the lovely Brooke Vincent taking her place.

When is Gemma Atkinson on Hits Radio?

Gemma presents the Gemma Atkinson and Mike Toolan show on Hits Radio every weekday afternoon from 4pm. Join the pair for loads of music, banter, and unmissable features.

What TV shows has Gemma Atkinson appeared on?

Before working at Hits Radio Gemma Atkinson appeared on a number of TV shows, both as a celebrity and as an actress.

Gemma started her acting career on Hollyoaks as Lisa Hunter in 2001, and went on to appear in Casualty as Tamzin Bayle, between 2011‚Äì2012 and 2014, and as Carly Hope on Emmerdale, 2015‚Äì2017.

She's also appeared on other shows such as I'm a Celebrity, Strictly Come Dancing and most recently Gemma and Gorka: Life Behind the Lens, which has been commissioned for a second series.

Which movies has she been in?

As well as her TV appearances, Gemma has also acted in a number of films including Baseline in 2009, How to Stop Being a Loser in 2011 and Fever in 2016.

She has been in a couple of horror films too, including 2010 movie 13Hrs, Devil's Pass (2013), a remake of Night of the Living Dead (2013) and Cain Hill (2017) with her Emmerdale co-star Michael Parr.

Does she have a children's book out?

She does! In February 2024, Gemma released her first ever children's book called Dogs Don't Dance.

Discussing her new book on Lorraine on Wednesday 7th Feb, Gemma said: "The thing I love about this book is that obviously the dance element is there, but I was always mindful that I can‚Äôt dance but I gave it a go. With Strictly you learn a dance routine, you don‚Äôt learn to dance. You learn a routine, but then it‚Äôs forgotten - but I still tried and I still did really well, and I had the best time and ultimately it changed my life because I met Gorka and we have children.

‚ÄúSo the kind of message with the book is that if they try something out of their comfort zone, even if they‚Äôre scared, give it a go because you never know how it could end up.‚Äù

Dogs Don't Dance is available to purchase now.

Gemma Atkinson's career so far:

From playing Lisa on Hollyoaks, to Carly on Emmerdale, and dazzling on the dance floor of Strictly Come Dancing, here's a look back at Gemma Atkinson's incredible career so far.

What is Gemma's podcast called?

Gemma's podcast The Overshare launched in September 2023, and sees Gemma chatting about all sorts of topics - as she describes it: 'Real stories, real emotions, and real connections coming your way! üó£Ô∏èüí¨'.

Speaking about her podcast, Gemma said: "I‚Äôm so excited to finally launch The Overshare! I‚Äôve been a guest on many podcasts, so to now host my own and have the opportunity to sit and chat with the listeners, it's been great. Real people with real stories from the heartbreaking to the heartwarming. I know people will relate to the topics we‚Äôve covered and I can‚Äôt wait for you all to hear it."

In the preview for her podcast she opened up about the different names she and Gorka had for their new baby, ultimately deciding on Thiago which is a Portuguese name.

When was Gemma on Strictly Come Dancing?

Gemma appeared on Strictly Come Dancing back in 2017, which saw actor Joe McFadden win the Glitterball Trophy. Gemma and her dance partner Alja≈æ ≈†korjanec were runners-up in the 15th series of the show.

This is also where Gemma met her fianc√© Gorka Marquez. Despite not being paired with him, the two spent time together and hit it off!

Is Gemma Atkinson in Hollyoaks?

Gemma started her acting career on Hollyoaks playing the role of Lisa Hunter between 2001‚Äì2005. She returned to the show for some spin-offs including Hollyoaks: After Hours (2004), Hollyoaks: Let Loose (2005) and Hollyoaks: In the City (2006).

Is she back on Hollyoaks?

In March 2022, Gemma reprised her Hollyoaks role of Lisa Hunter for two episodes. Of her return, Gemma said: 'Short but sweet visit back to playing Lisa Hunter in @hollyoaksofficial What a trip down memory lane.

'So different, yet so familiar. 22 years ago my career started at this place, on this set, in the ‚ÄúHunters‚Äù house. Forever Grateful for the wonderful memories, and for the fact there was no social media in those days.'

Can Gemma sing?

Yes, Gemma Atkinson can sing. The Hits Radio presenter took part in Soapstar Superstar in 2007, and performed Joan Jett's classic 'I Love Rock 'n' Roll' as well as songs by P!nk and Kylie Minogue. Gemma ended the second series of Soapstar Superstar in fifth place.

What year was Gemma Atkinson on I'm A Celebrity?

Gemma Atkinson was a contestant on I'm a Celebrity Get Me Out of Here in 2007, placing 5th in the year that Christopher Biggins won.

Gemma's first book: The Ultimate Body Plan

Gemma released her first book The Ultimate Body Plan in 2018, a combination of 75 delicious recipes, plus a workout plan to help you towards a fitter, stronger, healthier body.

Gemma's second book: The Ultimate Body Plan for New Mums

Gem's next, The Ultimate Body Plan for New Mums, was released in April 2022. In the run up to the release Gemma shared some details, including what it feels like immediately after giving birth and some recipes to try.

Gemma's In The Style collections

In January 2023, Gemma launched her Activewear collection with In The Style. The range of clothes includes leggings, half-zip tops, sports tops, joggers and more, in sizes 6 - 24.

Then, in September 2023, Gemma released another collection with In The Style, for the Autumn. Gemma told her fans: 'We‚Äôve included lots of versatile pieces into this range from sweats to knitted dresses to knitted jumpers to lounge sets and so much more! I love it üí´'.

Is Gemma on CBeebies?

In April 2022, Gemma Atkinson joined CBeebies show The Toddler Club as a presenter. Gemma said of joining the programme: "As a new mum, during the first lockdown I found comfort and reassurance watching programmes such as The Baby Club and The Toddler Club At Home, so for me to now be a host is such an honour.

"The show covers so many basics for us as parents and lets us know we‚Äôre not alone, every toddler is different and that‚Äôs ok. To be presenting a show that helps children develop and lets parents feel we‚Äôre all in the same boat is wonderful."

Who is Gemma Atkinson's partner?

Gemma is engaged to her partner Gorka Marquez, who is a professional dancer on Strictly Come Dancing.

Check out Gemma and Gorka's relationship so far:

How did Gemma meet her fianc√© Gorka Marquez?

Gemma Atkinson met her fianc√© Gorka Marquez on Strictly Come Dancing, when she was a contestant and he was a professional dancer. Despite not being paired together on the show, the couple immediately hit it off, with Gemma and Gorka later announcing their relationship.

In an interview with Lorraine back in January 2019, Gemma said: "He makes me so happy, he really does. I've been on my own for around three years, and now I'm living with Gorka. We both cook but with him being Spanish he's just better at cooking. He's the chef in the house and he's nice and tidy. It's like living with your best mate."

Gorka later revealed in another interview on the show: "Thanks to the Strictly tour, I got the chance to spend more time with her and get to know each other better. We are very happy."

When did Gemma and Gorka get engaged?

Gemma and partner Gorka got engaged on Valentine's Day 2021. Gemma shared the news on Instagram. She wrote: ‚ÄòValentine‚Äôs forever... Of course I said yes', with Gorka sharing an identical snap with the line: 'The best day with my forever Valentine‚Äôs. I asked and she said YES!!!!!! Happy Valentine‚Äôs Day everyone.'

Is Gemma Atkinson pregnant?

Not anymore! Gemma revealed to fans that she and fianc√© Gorka were expecting their second baby in a sweet Instagram post on 22nd January 2023. Sharing a few black and white snaps of herself, Gorka and their daughter Mia, she revealed the couple were expecting a little boy.

She wrote: 'Impossible to hide my belly any longer. I‚Äôve officially ‚Äúpopped.‚Äù üòÇ Our baby boy will be joining our family later this year üíô

'We feel so incredibly blessed and Grateful to be on this journey again. Mia is absolutely thrilled! Although we may need to do some negotiating on names, as so far she‚Äôs adamant he‚Äôs going to be called Barbie. üòÇüíô'.

How many children does Gemma have?

She has two! Gemma and Gorka welcomed their first child in 2019. She announced the news that they were expecting for the first time in February 2019 with her dogs Norman and Ollie getting involved in the announcement.

In the post, Gemma wrote: 'And what Amazing big brothers they will be! Myself & Gorks are beyond excited and happy and feel incredibly blessed to be meeting our new family member later this year. Baby Marquez!!! We love you loads already ‚ù§Ô∏èü§∞ @gorka_marquez'. (sic)

After announcing she was expecting her second child in January 2023, Gemma confirmed she'd given birth to a baby boy in July 2023.

Taking to her Instagram Story, she wrote: 'Little man is here! He arrived safe and sound and he's utterly wonderful. Mia is already the mother hen we expected her to be. We're all home together soaking up this lovely little bubble before Gorks has to leave for Strictly rehearsals next week. Thank you for the lovely well wishes. Our family is complete'. (Sic)

A few days later, Gemma introduced her son to the world, revealing he is called Thiago Thomas Marquez.

A year later, Gemma shared an adorable Reel to her fans, celebrating little Thiago's first birthday. Showing clips from the day she and Gorka brought their son home, as well as sweet moments from the year that followed, they wrote: 'A whole year of loving you üíô

'Thiago Thomas, what would we do without you. Such a happy, loving, cheeky and curious bundle of joy. You make us smile every single day and you couldn‚Äôt be more loved. Thank you for allowing me to become a mum again. I never thought id be lucky enough to have two beautiful children. You and your sister are the perfect duo. I can‚Äôt wait to see you grow together and whiteness the shenanigans you both get up to üòÇ

'Happy Birthday darling boy! We love you üíô'. (sic)

Gemma and Gorka's daughter

Gemma had a little girl called Mia Louise Marquez on 4th July 2019. She wrote on Instagram: 'And just like that, we‚Äôre a three! Our beautiful baby daughter arrived on Thursday 4th July and myself and Gorks couldn‚Äôt be happier üíóüíóüíó She's incredible and she certainly made an entrance, giving us all quite a fright at times! Little Miss independent already!

'Thank you SO much to the nurses & doctors at The Royal Bolton Hospital who did the most incredible job taking care of myself and my baby. You‚Äôre all so wonderful and I‚Äôm so grateful to have had you all with me and to have been under your care these past 4 days üôè Back home now for family time and to introduce little lady to her big brothers Norman & Ollie.... Let the next life chapter begin @gorka_marquez ü§±üê∂üê∂‚ù§'. (sic)

The couple revealed the first photo of Mia to their fans on Instagram a couple of weeks later and she now regularly features on Gemma's Instagram.

How many dogs does Gemma Atkinson have?

Gemma had two cute spaniels called Norman and Ollie. Sadly, Norman passed away in June 2024, and Gemma shared a heartbreaking post on her Instagram page to pay tribute to him, uploading a beautiful video collage of her pooch with the statement: 'My beautiful boy Norman has passed away.

'My heart is broken üòû 12 years ago I made a promise to him that i would always take care of him and never allow him be in pain or to suffer. Had I put off making the hardest decision of my life any longer I would have broken that promise. It‚Äôs hard to put into words how much Norman changed my life and made it so much better Simply by just being there.

'Throughout the good & bad experiences the last 12 years he‚Äôs been there with Ollie making everything ok. My most favourite weekends were spent having long walks exploring together, then home lay in bed cosy with them both watching a film while they snored away peacefully. I think I‚Äôll miss that the most‚Ä¶That and the fact Norm was always the only one in the whole house to get up and come downstairs with me in the mornings no matter how early it was.

'My 5am club won‚Äôt be the same without his company. He was my first experience of being a mum and having someone other than myself to care for. He‚Äôs taught me a lot. Mainly to always live in the moment, remain positive and to keep trying. He never stopped trying to just get up and please me. Even at the end.

'He was the most gentle and caring soul combined with fierce love and loyalty to his family, his pack. I believe he was always meant to be my dog. I feel so sad for Ollie who‚Äôs now wondering where Norman is üòî Smelling him but not being able to see or play with him will be confusing.

'I‚Äôve read that dogs too notice the absence of other dogs, and i know he‚Äôs just as sad as I am. And of course I‚Äôm beyond sad for Mia. Normans woken her up by going into her room and pinching her Snuggie almost everyday of her life. She‚Äôs never known him or Ollie to not be here. Her first best friend. And so close to her 5th Birthday üòî

'They say the sadness we feel when we lose a loved one is the price we pay for loving them so much, and boy did i love you Norman. In all these years the only time you‚Äôve broken my heart is today, when yours stopped beating. I‚Äôm going to love you, miss you and remember you forever. Until we meet again Norman‚Ä¶ Go and run again and have some fun up there with my dad. You‚Äôre such a good boy ‚ù§Ô∏è üêæ üêæ.' (sic)

Is Gemma Atkinson on Instagram?

Yes, Gemma is on Instagram as well as other social networks, and she regularly posts photos of her home life with fianc√© Gorka Marquez and little daughter Mia.

In March 2022, Gemma posted some super cute Instagram Stories showing a photo of some letters she wrote when she was 12-years-old. Reading a letter to her fans she said: "Dear Clive, my uncle Clive, thank you very much for your card. P.s. here's an autograph before I become famous and don't forget about you." Exclaiming, she said: "I genuinely signed it!"

Gemma Atkinson regularly posts about her home life, and opened up about the reality of a photoshoot. The former actress took to Instagram to post two pics showing how clever cropping can make it look like she has bare legs saying: ''#tb Photo shoot reality‚Ä¶ ‚Äúare you seeing my full leg?‚Äù No. ‚ÄúFab, shoot like this then it‚Äôs freezing‚Äù üì∏ üòÇ'.

She went on to say: 'Amazing makeup artist, good lighting & great photographers and remind everyone that without them, I‚Äôm a tired a-- mum who needs help on the daily üòÇ.'

Gemma Atkinson on social media

Gemma Atkinson regularly keeps her fans updated on social media.

Follow Gemma on Twitter @MissGAtkinson

Follow Gemma on Instagram @glouiseatkinson

Like Gemma's page on Facebook @GemmaAtkinsonOfficial

You can follow Gemma and Gorka's adventures on YouTube.

How to listen to Hits Radio:

Turn it up with Hits Radio! Home of Fleur East, Sam Thompson and Gemma Atkinson playing the biggest hits and the biggest throwbacks, alongside the biggest laughs and life-changing competitions. Tune in on FM, DAB, online or ask your Smart Speaker to 'Play Hits Radio'.
